notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, E.P. and O.K.; data curation, E.P., O.K., I.S., M.S., T.M., A.S. (Anastasia Suvorova), A.K., A.F., and K.S.; formal analysis, E.P., O.K., I.S., and K.S.; funding acquisition, E.P. and K.S.; investigation, E.P., O.K., I.S., and K.S.; methodology, E.P., O.K., I.S., M.S., T.M., A.S. (Anastasia Suvorova), A.K., and A.F.; project administration, E.P., A.A., D.D., A.S. (Alexander Shestopalov), A.D., and K.S.; resources, E.P. and O.K.; software, I.S., A.K., and A.F.; supervision, E.P.; validation, E.P., O.K., I.S., A.K., A.F., and K.S.; visualization, E.P. and M.S.; writing—original draft, E.P., O.K., I.S., and K.S.; writing—review and editing, E.P., O.K., I.S., D.D., A.K., A.F., E.R., and K.S. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
